mapper.insert: insert into company (id, `name`, `type`, address, legal_representative, registered_capital, start_time, end_time, scopeof_business, registration_authority, audit_time, submit_time, state) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalRepresentative,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registeredCapital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{scopeOfBusiness,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registrationAuthority,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{auditTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{submitTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER})
